```{r,results='hide',warning=FALSE,message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
```

## Problem 1

#### Load the `Penguins` data set
```{r}
data("penguins", package = "palmerpenguins")
print(penguins)
```

#### Description of the `Penguins`data set

1. The `penguins` data set has `r ncol(penguins)` columns and `r nrow(penguins)`rows

2. The column names of the data set are `r colnames(penguins)`

3. The mean flipper length is `r mean(penguins$flippers_length_mm)`


#### Scatter Plot
```{r}
ggplot(penguins,aes(x = flipper_length_mm,y = bill_length_mm,colour = species)) + geom_point()

ggsave("scatter_plot_flipper_vs_bill.pdf")
 
```
